The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

The '''''1976 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1975]]. It features art by [[The Brothers Hildebrandt]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
==Illustrations==

* January - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Gandalf Visits Bilbo.jpg|Gandalf Visits Bilbo]]"
* February - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Tom Bombadil.jpg|Tom Bombadil]]"
* March - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - At the Prancing Pony.jpg|At the Prancing Pony]]"
* April - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Bilbo at Rivendell.jpg|Bilbo at Rivendell]]"
* May - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Ring of Galadriel.jpeg|The Ring of Galadriel]]"
* June - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Captured by the Orcs.jpg|Captured by the Orcs]]"
* Centrefold - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Fellowship of the Ring.jpeg|The Fellowship of the Ring]]"
* July - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Road to Minas Tirith.jpg|The Road to Minas Tirith]]"
* August - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Treebeard.jpg|Treebeard]]"
* September - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Saruman at Orthanc.jpg|Saruman at Orthanc]]"
* October - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - City of the Ringwraiths.jpg|City of the Ringwraiths]]"
* November - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildenbrandt - Éowyn & The Nazgûl.jpg|Éowyn and the Nazgûl]]"
* December - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Return of the King.jpg|The Return of the King]]"
